/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/Initializing:
INITIALIZING
S_NUI_INITIALIZING
The device is connected, but still initializing.
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/NotConnected:
NOTCONNECTED
E_NUI_NOTCONNECTED
The device is not connected.
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/NotGenuine:
NOTGENUINE
E_NUI_NOTGENUINE
The SDK is reporting the Kinect as invalid.
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/NotSupported:
NOTSUPPORTED
E_NUI_NOTSUPPORTED
The device is unsupported. (Xbox Kinect requires the SDK)
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/InsufficientB:
INSUFFICIENTBANDWIDTH
E_NUI_INSUFFICIENTBANDWIDTH
The device is connected to a hub without the necessary bandwidth requirements.
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/NotPowered:
NOTPOWERED
E_NUI_NOTPOWERED
There is either a problem with your adapter/cables or with the Kinect device driver registration in Windows.
/Plugins/KinectV1/Statuses/NotReady:
NOTREADY
E_NUI_NOTREADY
There was some other unspecified error.
